channel.title: I need someone to help me make a website with a donation tab
channel.description: hello my name is nick and well i need someone to help me make a website you can donate from and receive items in the game and about the voting rewards and what not if you can help me ill do anything you want if its payment deal idc if it's in cash paypal or rsgp let me know and ill get it to you

item.title: I need someone to help me make a website with a donation tab
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

The first thing I’d advise you to do is start thinking to yourself what type of website are you in need of. There’s plenty of forums out there which you can choose from, if you’re willing to invest I’d start off with SMF forums as its a good place to start from.

Once you’ve got used to the grasp of website development, you could maybe move onto something much bigger like: Vbulletin or IFB forums.

Read full topic
item.source: I need someone to help me make a website with a donation tab
